title: LifeQuest: Gospel-Aligned Life Gamification
description: WoW-style tracking and gamification of spiritual life, habits, and growth

xp_system.description: Gain XP for healthy habits, spiritual disciplines, self-care, and creativity

quests.daily: Small, repeatable actions (read Scripture, workout, call family)
quests.weekly: Larger goals (complete a project, serve someone, Sabbath rest)
quests.epic: Major life milestones with significant rewards

patches.description: Visual patches tied to the Woven Witness Covenant

ui_concepts.character_sheet: IRL stats displayed like WoW character panel
ui_concepts.nameplates: Quick-glance status for self and close circle
ui_concepts.inventory: Tracked items: favorite verses, tools, spiritual gifts
ui_concepts.guild: IRL party/guild with shared quests and group buffs
ui_concepts.zones: Different areas of life: Work, Family, Faith, Rest, Creativity

combat_system.boss_fights: Major life trials, always gospel-centered resolution

sacred_logbook.description: Auto-logs encounters, victories, lessons, and gospel reflections

implementation_notes.phase_1: Build core data models and logging commands
implementation_notes.phase_3: Create visual UI (could be HTML scroll or app)
implementation_notes.phase_4: Integrate with Alfred for voice commands
implementation_notes.phase_5: Add guild/party features for accountability partners

scripture_anchor.text: Do you not know that those who run in a race all run, but one receives the prize? Run in such a way that you may obtain it. And everyone who competes for the prize is temperate in all things.
